    main

Display the operating characteristics using an oc object

Source: R/plotOc.R
plotOc.Rd

Reads results from ocPredprob, ocPostprob etc. and displays a bar plot of the operating characteristics

Usage

plotOc(z)

Arguments

z

returned oc value

Value

nothing, only plots as side effect

Examples

# get operating character result from oc.postprob

res1 <- ocPostprob(
  nnE = c(10, 20, 30), truep = 0.4, p0 = 0.2,
  p1 = 0.3, tL = 0.6, tU = 0.8, parE = c(1, 1), sim = 50000
)
res1$oc
#>   ExpectedN PrStopEarly PrEarlyEff PrEarlyFut PrEfficacy PrFutility PrGrayZone
#> 1   19.1546     0.67212    0.61794    0.05418    0.75192    0.05574    0.19234

plotOc(res1)
